function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Close contact in built environments can facilitate the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious diseases transmission, leading to outbreaks and pandemics.","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures, improving ventilation systems, and enhancing cleaning and disinfection protocols.","Technologies":"Enhanced air filtration systems, automated disinfection technologies, and contactless interfaces.","People":"Occupants of built environments, including residents, employees, and visitors.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and public health authorities."}]}
